SELECT R.* FROM ( SELECT SUM(1) OVER(PARTITION BY NULL) AS TOTAL_RECORD_COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY A.CODE DESC) AS RNUM, A.CODE_ID, B.CODE_ID_NM, A.CODE, A.CODE_NM, A.CODE_DC, A.USE_AT FROM LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE A INNER JOIN LETTCCMMNCODE B ON A.CODE_ID = B.CODE_ID WHERE B.USE_AT = 'Y' AND B.CODE_ID = #{codeId}
) R WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY CAST( REPLACE(CODE, CONCAT(CODE_ID, '_'), '') AS INT) ASC

ORDER BY CAST( REPLACE(CODE, CONCAT(CODE_ID, '_'), '') AS INT) ASC
